readme.org: Documentation file that explains what gptel-plus is—a collection of enhancements for gptel (an Emacs LLM interface package)—including installation instructions and details about its cost estimation feature.
gptel-plus.el: Main source file that implements enhancements for gptel, including cost estimation features, context management tools, and automatic mode activation for Org and Markdown files.
.gptel-files.json: A JSON file used by gptel to store descriptions of project files for dynamic context selection.
COPYING.txt: The full text of the GNU General Public License (GPL) version 3, which is the free software license that governs how gptel can be distributed, modified, and shared while preserving user freedoms.
